newsitem.title: LUXEMBOURG: Cargolux traffic up 14pct in June, 15 pct.
newsitem.headline: Cargolux traffic up 14pct in June, 15 pct.

text.p: Cargolux Airlines International said it flew 186.1 million freight tonne kilometres (FTK), last month, up 14 percent on June 1996.
The FTK measurement is derived by multiplying the weight of cargo carried by the distance flown.
The Luxembourg-based cargo airline flew 1.08 billion FTK in the first half of 1997, a 15 percent rise on the same period last year.
Cargolux operates a fleet of three Boeing 747-400Fs and is to take delivery of a further two 400Fs in August and November this year.
It also operates four Boeing 747-200Fs, including one on leaseback. Earlier this week Lufthansa Cargo confirmed it was talks
with Swissair Cargo to sell its 24.5 percent stake in
- Reuters Air Cargo Service Tel+ 44 171 542 7706 Fax +5017 - www.racs.com
